control_attributes.Control: CA-3 (3) UNCLASSIFIED NON-NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, non-national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment; organization-defined boundary protection device].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization retains [Assignment: organization-defined previous versions of baseline configurations of the information system] to support rollback.

Control Statement: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, non-national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment; organization-defined boundary protection device].
Control Name: CA-3 (3) UNCLASSIFIED NON-NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
